verses.text: Except the \+w LORD strong="H3068"\+w** build the house, they labour in vain that build it: except the \+w LORD strong="H3068"\+w** keep the city, the watchman waketh but* in vain.+ 127.1 for…: or, of Solomon*+ 127.1 that…: Heb. that are builders of it in it*
It is* vain for you to rise up early, to sit up late, to eat the bread of sorrows: for* so he giveth his beloved sleep.
Lo, children are* an heritage of the \+w LORD strong="H3068"\+w**: and* the fruit of the womb is his* reward.
As arrows are* in the hand of a mighty man; so are* children of the youth.

Happy is* the man that hath his quiver full of them: they shall not be ashamed, but they shall speak with the enemies in the gate.+ 127.5 his…: Heb. filled his quiver with them*+ 127.5 speak…: or, subdue, or, destroy*
